segments.text: I can't believe my eyes, the sink is completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water just keeps pouring, drenching everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she's there, polishing away, totally ignoring it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is ridiculous, the floor's a lake now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's up on that unstable stool, grabbing cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks like he might topple over any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping by reaching up, part of the scheme.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why aren't they careful with all this water around?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets will be warped from the moisture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is pristine, such a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sick thinking about the slip hazard for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She needs to turn off that faucet immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies might not even be worth this trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a mess they're creating without realizing.
segments.speaker: PAR
